document.full_text: the european union has a number of options to restructure greece's debt; the trick is to allow the euro to survive and to stem any further collapse of greece or other at-risk countries.
document.title: greece has ways to fix debt woes, but all lead to misery
lines_and_colors: the european union has a number of options to restructure greece's debt; the trick is to allow the euro to survive and to stem any further collapse of greece or other at-risk countries.
